58#include <sys/cdefs.h>
59/* __FBSDID("$FreeBSD: head/sys/cddl/compat/opensolaris/kern/opensolaris_kobj.c 285391 2015-07-11 16:22:48Z mjg $"); */
60__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: kobj.c,v 1.6 2019/01/27 02:08:35 pgoyette Exp $");
61
62#include <sys/types.h>
63#include <sys/systm.h>
64#include <sys/kernel.h>
65#include <sys/kthread.h>
66#include <sys/namei.h>
67#include <sys/proc.h>
68#include <sys/filedesc.h>
69#include <sys/fcntl.h>
70#include <sys/kobj.h>
71
72void
73kobj_free(void *address, size_t size)
74{
75
76 kmem_free(address, size);
77}
78
79void *
80kobj_alloc(size_t size, int flag)
81{
82
83 return (kmem_alloc(size, (flag & KM_NOWAIT) ? KM_NOSLEEP : KM_SLEEP));
84}
85
86void *
87kobj_zalloc(size_t size, int flag)
88{
89
90 return (kmem_zalloc(size, (flag & KM_NOWAIT) ? KM_NOSLEEP : KM_SLEEP));
91}
92
93static void *
94kobj_open_file_vnode(const char *file)
95{
96 vnode_t *vp;
97
98 if (vn_open(file, UIO_SYSSPACE, FREAD|FCREAT, 0, &vp, CRCREAT, 0) != 0) {
99 return NULL;
100 }
101 return vp;
102}
103
104struct _buf *
105kobj_open_file(const char *file)
106{
107 struct _buf *out;
108
109 out = kmem_alloc(sizeof(*out), KM_SLEEP);
110 out->mounted = 1;
111 out->ptr = kobj_open_file_vnode(file);
112 if (out->ptr == NULL) {
113 kmem_free(out, sizeof(*out));
114 return ((struct _buf *)-1);
115 }
116 return (out);
117}
118
119static int
120kobj_get_filesize_vnode(struct _buf *file, uint64_t *size)
121{
122 struct vattr va;
123 int error;
124
125 error = VOP_GETATTR(file->ptr, &va, 0, kcred, NULL);
126 if (error == 0)
127 *size = (uint64_t)va.va_size;
128 return (error);
129}
130
131int
132kobj_get_filesize(struct _buf *file, uint64_t *size)
133{
134
135 return (kobj_get_filesize_vnode(file, size));
136}
137
138int
139kobj_read_file_vnode(struct _buf *file, char *buf, unsigned size, unsigned off)
140{
141 int error;
142 size_t resid;
143
144 error = vn_rdwr(UIO_READ, file->ptr, buf, size, off, UIO_SYSSPACE, 0,
145 RLIM64_INFINITY, kcred, &resid);
146 return (error != 0 ? -1 : size - resid);
147}
148
149int
150kobj_read_file(struct _buf *file, char *buf, unsigned size, unsigned off)
151{
152
153 return (kobj_read_file_vnode(file, buf, size, off));
154}
155
156void
157kobj_close_file(struct _buf *file)
158{
159
160 if (file->mounted) {
161 vn_close(file->ptr, FREAD, kcred);
162 }
163 kmem_free(file, sizeof(*file));
164}
